name: chameleon-deception-system
description: Chameleon Adaptive Deception System - Advanced Cybersecurity Honeypot

scripts.start:backend: cd Backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd Backend && python3.12 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run build:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd Backend && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run install:frontend
